description: Borrowed from Latin nebula (“little cloud, mist”)  +‎ -ize.

verbs.description: nebulize (third-person singular simple present nebulizes, present participle nebulizing, simple past and past participle nebulized)

entries.meaning: To convert liquid into a fine spray of aerosols, by using a nebulizer; to atomize
(medicine) To treat a patient with medicine applied using a nebulizer
